metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12135 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: bson before 0.8 incorrectly uses int rather than size_t for many variables, parameters, and return values. In particular, the bson_ensure_space() parameter bytesNeeded could have an integer overflow via properly constructed bson input.

criterions.comment: duo-unix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
whoopsie: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
